Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
